message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going for 50/50. You can do better than that!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't think you're getting the better deal!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about splitting it fairly. I'll take a bigger share this time.
I'm not afraid to take a bigger share, but I'm still willing to compromise. Meet me in the middle!
I'm not budging, Alice. You're going to have to make a better offer if you want to get more than a pittance.
I'm not going down without a fight. You're going to have to give me a bit more if you want to get the majority!
I'm not going to be taken advantage of. You're getting a tiny share, Alice. Don't expect any more charity from me.
I'm not giving up yet. I need a decent share to survive. Meet me at this point or I'll walk away!
